short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the NetSuite guided help movable component.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes the NetSuite Guide on the NetSuite page. 

NetSuite provides a preference setting to remove this icon, but once you change roles or accounts, you need to set the preference setting again. This removes the need to do that.
